tabs.default:
Artoria is the God of Time, the Founder of [[Soul Cultivation]] and legendary being known only in the most ancient of scriptures. He is the master of [[Aulindrel]].

Artoria is known as the Godslayer who slaughtered most of the Major and minor gods during the [[Eternal Era]], ending the conflict between gods and mortals. But in the process, most of [[Mirdum]] was destroyed, leaving nothing but scattered isles of land.

He was responsible for the creation of [[Eternal Artefacts]], legendary cursed items wielding supreme power.
